description:
The trail starts on 1B then turns into many different trails.

Varied trail with steep sections, creek crossings, dense mossy forest in one section.  In mid spring the mosquitoes are a challenge, however, fall will be perfect.
directions: At Champlain lookout in the Gatineau Park, park at the far end of the parking lot on the gravel section.
title: Champlain 1B - Gatineau Park
